com.robopupu.api.plugin

Interface PluginComponent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Feature, FeatureManager, Interactor, Manager, PluginStateComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFeature, AbstractFeatureManager, AbstractFeaturePresenter, AbstractInteractor, AbstractManager, AbstractPluginComponent, AbstractPluginStateComponent, AbstractPresenter, GraphInteractor, PermissionRequestManager, PluginActivity, PluginCompatActivity, StateMachineInteractor

    public interface PluginComponent
    PluginComponent extends Scopeable to define an interface for plugin components that can be plugged into PluginBus.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPlugged(PluginBus bus)
      Invoked when this PluginComponent has been plugged to given PluginBus.
      void onPluginPlugged(java.lang.Object plugin)
      Invoked when the given plugin object has been plugged to PluginBus.
      void onPluginUnplugged(java.lang.Object plugin)
      Invoked when the given plugin object has been unplugged from PluginBus.
      void onUnplugged(PluginBus bus)
      Invoked when this PluginComponent has been unplugged from given PluginBus.

    • Method Detail
